messages.content: My admission status is showing admission in process

next_reply.content:
Hello Lawal Awawu Morenikeji, Welcome JAMB Support System,

Thank you for contacting us regarding your admission status. 

We understand that you are seeing "Admission in Process" on your JAMB portal.  To best assist you, could you please confirm if you have checked your admission status on the JAMB CAPS portal as well?  This will give us a clearer picture of your application's progress.

Once you confirm this information, we'll be able to guide you further. 

Sincerely, 
JAMB Support

messages.content:
Hello,

Please my cousin is having an issue of extended “Awaiting verification”.

She sat for the 2023 UTME exam and she is converting to Direct Entry, for which her ND result needed to be verified by her previous institution.

The previous institution is Petroleum Training institute, Effurun Delta state. We have enquired from them and they confirmed to have received the verification request from you and they also confirmed to have verified the result.

This was done in January this year and she opened a ticket on this for which she was told to be patient and allow time for the verification.

It has been three months now since the last response and her NEPID status is still reading Awaiting Verification, and her intended school will be resuming lectures on the 23rd of this month.

Kindly assist look into this as it seems we are running against time now:

Student Name:                    Bilikis Olohimai Aigbovbiosa

Jamb Reg. Number:            202330699262DFU

Email:                                   aigbovbiosabilikis13@gmail.com

 

Many Thanks for your assistance

Hello,

 Yours is received, kindly hold on while we verify and revert.

Thank you.

Hello,

Please this is a follow up on this ticket;

You are yet to get back to me on this and status of initial complaint remains same.

Kindly assist look into this towards a resolution.

Many thanks

next_reply.content:
Hello Goodman AIgbovbiosa, Welcome JAMB Support System,

Thank you for contacting us again regarding the verification status of your cousin, Bilikis Olohimai Aigbovbiosa, with JAMB registration number 202330699262DFU.

We understand your concern about the delay and the approaching resumption date for her intended institution. We want to assure you that we are looking into this issue with utmost priority.

To assist us in expediting the verification process, could you please confirm if Bilikis Olohimai Aigbovbiosa has accepted her admission on the JAMB CAPS platform? This information will help us determine the next steps in resolving this issue.

We will endeavor to provide an update on the status of her verification within 48 hours. 

Sincerely,
JAMB Support

messages.content:
Good day, having being offered admission after I applied for Part Time regularization and subsequently accept and paid for the admission letter, I haven't able to print my admission letter even after the payment for admission letter was successfully done.




This is my registration number: 11392622IEP
Good morning, this is the 3 week of logging this complaint yet no response and I need to print this admission letter for my DE registration which closes next week
Good day, it's another week and my complaint is yet to be attended to whereas DE registration closes on the 25th

Hello, Welcome to JAMB Support Centre,

Your complaint has been escalated, we shall revert if there is any further directive on your complaint.

Thank you for contacting JAMB Support Centre.
Okay but the complaints should be attended to in earnest as the admission letter will be use for DE Registration

next_reply.content:
Hello Quadri Maryam, Welcome JAMB Support System,

        We sincerely apologize for the delay in responding to your request and any inconvenience this may have caused. 

        We understand you are unable to print your admission letter despite confirming payment. To assist you effectively, could you please confirm if you accepted your admission on the JAMB CAPS platform?

        We are currently looking into your issue and will get back to you with an update within the next 24 hours. 

        Sincerely,
        JAMB Support
